short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the overall TimeChimp user interface and experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves the overall TimeChimp user interface and experience.

- Show time entry descriptions on the rows in the day view.
- Remove the "TimeChimp Tracker" ad from the timeline view, and make entries full-width.
- Listen for ctrl+enter in the description field to submit the form.
- Correct 3-digit times in the start and end time fields (e.g. "930" -> "09:30").
- Show time entry end times in the timeline view.
- Show time entry descriptions in the timeline view.
